parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit to fire on the given target (via the radio).
If the target is [[objNull]], the unit is ordered to fire on its current target (set with [[doTarget]] or [[commandTarget]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''commandFire''' target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ESoldier1 [[commandFire]] _WSoldier1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fire]], [[doFire]], [[canFire]], [[fireAtTarget]], [[forceWeaponFire]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[commandSuppressiveFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[doSuppressiveFire]], [[isManualFire]]
</value></part></template>
